pkgmetadata.longdescription: API Wrapper for GIE's AGSI+/ALSI+ Natural Gas Storage Transparency Platform // Functions to access the API for Gas Infrastructure Europe's (GIE) AGSI+/ALSI+ natural gas storage transparency platform (https://agsi.gie.eu/ and https://alsi.gie.eu/). Lets the user easily download metadata on companies and gas storage units covered by the API as well as the respective data on regional, country, company or facility level.
